SELECT t1.id, t1.title, t1.type, t2.nickname AS publisherName, t1.level, t1.target_type, t1.publish_status, t1.publish_time, t1.revoke_time, t1.create_time FROM sys_notice t1 LEFT JOIN sys_user t2 ON t2.id = t1.publisher_id WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0
AND t1.title LIKE '%' || #{queryParams.title} || '%'
AND t1.publish_status = #{queryParams.publishStatus}
AND TRUNC(t1.publish_time) >= TO_DATE(SUBSTR(#{queryParams.publishTime[0]}, 1, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TRUNC(t1.publish_time) <= TO_DATE(SUBSTR(#{queryParams.publishTime[1]}, 1, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY t1.publish_time DESC, t1.create_time DESC

SELECT t1.id, t1.title, t1.content, t1.type, t2.nickname AS publisherName, t1.level, t1.publish_status, t1.publish_time FROM sys_notice t1 LEFT JOIN sys_user t2 ON t2.id = t1.publisher_id WHERE t1.id = #{id} AND t1.is_deleted = 0
